poster.username: Nikolai Medtner 梅特纳永远的神

body: Oh crap its smh kinda cute
Can't wait for the sequels to get translated

So far, this is pretty great gender bender doujin, I'm especially enjoying the slow development of her feelings about her new body, and the progressive change in her emotions :) I hope to see some Lesbian action in future chapters since she looks like she still has feelings for her crush. No matter where it goes, I'll follow this series with great interest :)

I used to not mind "gender change" doujins but now that there are so many, it feels like you are about to get brainwashed by this shit, which I find that troubling. Good comic but this genre, in general, is starting to annoy me.
Here before it ends on the popular page.
